title: Tonight's Hall Of Fame Game
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Peter C. Harvey being appointed as the appeal officer on Deshaun Watson’s case by Roger Goodell, tonight’s Hall of Fame game between the Raiders and the Jaguars, Aaron Rodgers' comments on WR Romeo Doubs and Diontae Johnson’s 2-year 36.7M extension. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Tonight is the NFL Hall of Fame Game and Aaron Rodgers' comments on Romeo Doubs.
